item.title: Get unstuck on your coding exercise with Just One Exercise
item.description: It doen’t take too long until you get stuck on a programming assignment. You try everything you can, with the resources you have. You start going through a crisis. That one that almost convinces you that quitting it all together and moving on is better. Things get so mixed. On Stackoverflow, you see the same tips everywhere. But you’ve tried them all so many times you’re sure you couldn’t miss them.
